intro: Premna thwaitesii f. glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth-leaved premna, is a flowering plant species belonging to the family Verbenaceae. It is characterized by its smooth, glabrous leaves that are typically ovate to elliptical in shape. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are usually white or pale pink, often with a slight purple tinge. It is native to Southeast Asia and thrives in tropical and subtropical climates. This variant is distinguished by its reduced pubescence compared to other forms of Premna thwaitesii.
